title: Ticket #1250: condor_ssh_to_job does work with slots containing multiple @s
description:
Setting

STARTD_NAME = blah

on a multi-slot system will result in slot names such as slot1@blah@hostname. This causes a problem in the command-line arguments to ssh, which result in authentication failure when using condor_ssh_to_job.
check_ins:
2010-Feb-24 16:57   Check-in [25318]: Documented fix for condor_ssh_to_job with slots containing multiple @ signs. #1250 (By Dan Bradley )
2010-Feb-24 16:46   Check-in [17335]: Fixed condor_ssh_to_job when dealing with slots containing multiple @ signs. #1250 (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
